definition: digest (of literature)/to make a digest (of data)/summary
to take/to borrow/to pick (flowers, fruit etc)/to pluck/to select/to remove/to take off (glasses, hat etc)

sentences.english: Abstract: Zero-crossing edge detection method was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 文摘:討論二階導數過零邊緣檢測方法。

sentences.english: This is the webpage of Geobase.
sentences.chinese: 這是地質學文摘數據庫的網頁。

sentences.english: Reader's Digest is the most influential magazine in Canadian publishing history.
sentences.chinese: 《讀者文摘》是加拿大發行史上最有影響力的雜誌。

sentences.english: He now even has the tremendous circulation of the Reader's Digest behind him.
sentences.chinese: 現在他的《讀者文摘》已經有了一個巨大的讀者羣。

sentences.english: I'm reading Reader's Digest in the kitchen. I am totally nonplussed.
sentences.chinese: 我在廚房裏看讀者文摘，完全不以爲然。

sentences.english: The magazine she gave me is Reader's Digest.
sentences.chinese: 她給我的雜誌是《讀者文摘》。

sentences.english: Be abstracted on the research paper of wild Coptis by Chemical Abstract.
sentences.chinese: 野生黃連研究成果被美國化學文摘收錄。

sentences.english: This article first appeared in the NTU Staff Digest.
sentences.chinese: 英文原刊在《南大職員文摘》。

sentences.english: The world smiles with Reader's digest.
sentences.chinese: 讀者文摘給世界理家來歡笑。

sentences.english: Can you shout us sth acres the pria lot emotion of the prose?
sentences.chinese: 你能說說這篇文摘的基調嗎？

sentences.english: Automatic multi-document summarization is an outgrowth of single document summarization.
sentences.chinese: 文本自動綜述是自動文摘在多文檔上的推廣。

sentences.english: This is a web page of BIOSIS Previews.
sentences.chinese: 這是生物學文摘預覽數據庫所在的網頁。

sentences.english: Chemical Abstracts Service Database provides the chemistry-related literature and patents.
sentences.chinese: 美國化學文摘數據庫提供與化學相關的文獻與專利。

definition: to carry a story/to publish (in a newspaper or magazine)
